item.title: Ghost of Yotei New Trailer Confirms October Release Date
item.content:encoded:
https://wccftech.com/ghost-of-yotei-release-date/

Ghost of Yotei will launch in early October on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 5 Pro, a new trailer shared today confirmed.

The new trailer, which can be watched below, confirmed the game will launch on the current generation PlayStation consoles on October 2nd worldwide. Besides confirming the release date, the new trailer also provides a new look at the Yotei Six, gang members that Atsu has sworn to hunt down. Needless to say, the game is looking great and is a considerable step up from Ghost of Tsushima, which was originally released on PlayStation 4 and was later ported to PlayStation 5 and PC to offer improved visuals and more.

Following the release of the new Ghost of Yotei trailer, a new post on the official PlayStation blog confirmed that pre-orders will begin next week on May 2nd at 10:00 AM local time. Besides the standard edition, which will cost $69.99 USD / £69.99 / €79.99 / ¥8,980 and include a copy of the game and some pre-order bonuses like a unique in-game mask and seven PSN avatars featuring concept art of Atsu and other members of the Yotei Six, players will also be able to pre-order the Digital Deluxe Edition, which will cost $79.99 / £79.99 / €89.99 / ¥9,980 and include in-game bonuses like The Snake armor, an alternate dye for the starting armor, early unlock of Traveler's Maps and more.

Also available for pre-order from May 2nd will be the Ghost of Yotei Collector's Edition, which will include all the bonuses available in the other editions of the game as well as a replica display edition of Atsu's Ghost mask, a replica of Atsu's sash, a replica of the Tsuba from Atsu's katana and a pouch of coins and instructions to play Zeni Hajiki, a game that will also be played in the game. The Collector's Edition will also include a foldable papercraft ginkgo tree along with a wolf at its base, and a set of four 5 x 7-inch art cards featuring the sash, the wolf, Atsu’s Ghost mask, and the game's key art.

Ghost of Yotei launches on PlayStation 5 on October 2nd, 2025, worldwide.
